Title: Man of Steel
Writer: David S. Goyer, Christopher Nolan, Jerry Siegel
Actors: Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon
Plot: An alien child is evacuated from his dying world and sent to Earth to live among humans. His peace is threatened when other survivors of his home planet invade Earth.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award7 wins & 46 nominations total
